The '''Falls of Gelion''' were located below the last ford over Gelion, i.e. [[Sarn Athrad]], and above the junction with the river [[Ascar]]<ref>{{WJ|Maeglin}}, p.335</ref>. South of the Falls, river Gelion became more swift and large due to its five tributaries and was name GabilƒÅn by the Dwarves<ref>{{WJ|Maeglin}}, p.335</ref>.

This location does not appear on the [[The Second 'Silmarillion' Map]], nor in any map of the Beleriand.
